name: Jvee Veneracion
text: Convergys is a BPO company. Converge is the ICT. How come you and a blockmate of mine were offered 50mbps straight? I was only offered 5mbps with option to upgrade after 6 months

source_obj.text: Convergys is a BPO company. Converge is the ICT. How come you and a blockmate of mine were offered 50mbps straight? I was only offered 5mbps with option to upgrade after 6 months

replies.text: Updated re:converge. Actually nagkagulo kami dun sa free upgrade from Bayan, they installed it but then someone f'ed up the paperwork and the line was showing up as cancelled when I call up CS. To clear things up, I just signed up to get a new line completely na sakin na nakapangalan (the old one was under my parent's name)
